Plot: When three young women are implicated in a crime, a retired lawyer steps forward to help them clear their names.
Writer: Shoojit Sircar (story), Aniruddha Roy Chowdhury (story), Ritesh Shah (story), Ritesh Shah (dialogue), Ritesh Shah (screenplay)
Actors: Tapsee Pannu, Amitabh Bachchan, Kirti Kulhari, Andrea Tariang
Title: Pink
